definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 內視鏡超音波與電腦斷層檢查也證明此病竈爲囊狀物。

sentences.english: Echocardiography demonstrated tricuspid chordae tendinae rupture with remarkable tricuspid regurgitation .
sentences.chinese: 心臟超音波證實三尖瓣腱索斷裂及明顯的三尖瓣逆流。

sentences.english: Echocardiography showed a pericardial cystic mass with external compression of the right ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 心臟超音波顯示心臟旁有一水泡狀囊腫且壓迫右心室。

sentences.english: Tips and tricks for abdominal ultrasound .
sentences.chinese: 腹部超音波的提示和技巧。

sentences.english: The team measured the length of the fibers in the calf muscles using ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究團隊使用超音波來測量小腿肌肉的纖維組織長度。

sentences.english: There are very few reports in the literature on sonographic findings of laryngocele.
sentences.chinese: 目前在關於喉囊腫超音波檢查文獻報告甚少。

sentences.english: The accuracy of liquid level on Ultra-sonic is high, however, the internal parts of equipment is complex and installment and maintainability are troublesome.
sentences.chinese: 超音波液位儀精準度高，但設備複雜且安裝維護麻煩。

sentences.english: Ultrasound examination revealed a right femoral artery pseudoaneurysm.
sentences.chinese: 超音波檢查發現右側股動脈假動脈瘤。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of IVUS imaging: side -looking and forward-looking.
sentences.chinese: 血管內超音波影像可分爲側向及前向兩類。

sentences.english: Certain blood tests and ultrasounds are commonly available genetic screening tests in pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 血液檢查和超音波檢查是常用的妊娠遺傳篩檢。

sentences.english: Ultrasonography can recognize gastric cancer but is usually in the late stage.
sentences.chinese: 超音波掃描可以查覺胃癌病竈，但多屬晚期病變。

sentences.english: A chest x-ray revealed opacity of the left hemithorax suggesting massive pleural effusion.
sentences.chinese: 胸部影像及胸腔超音波呈現左側大量肋膜積水。

sentences.english: The ultrasound transducer is driven by a multi -channel power amplifier system.
sentences.chinese: 此超音波換能器以多頻道功率放大系統驅動。

sentences.english: The superstitious man put the priority on the superficial supersonic superiority.
sentences.chinese: 迷信的人把優先權放在淺薄的超音波高傲上。

sentences.english: Abdominal ultrasound revealed a nodular multi-cystic mass in the left lower quadrant of the abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 腹部超音波顯示，結節性多囊性腫塊在左下腹的腹部。

sentences.english: Experiments with ultrasonics and brain lesions are done by universities.
sentences.chinese: 超音波實驗和腦病變是在大學完成。

definition: laser (loanword used in Taiwan)/also written 鐳射|镭射

pinyin: dian4 nao3 duan4 ceng2 sao3 miao2
